articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Urgent diplomacy enables the release of 13 more Israelis and 39 Palestinians under a fragile Gaza truce deal.
articles.title: More Gaza hostages released by Hamas despite agonising delay

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Some residents have returned to northern Gaza during a four-day pause in fighting between Israel and Hamas.
articles.title: Watch: Gazans take stock of their damaged neighbourhoods

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The Irish-Israeli nine-year-old Emily Hand is reunited with her father after being released by Hamas.
articles.title: Watch: Moment nine-year-old hostage is reunited with father

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: When a drifter moves in with an older rich woman they say they are in love - but a family is torn apart.
articles.title: The homeless handyman and the wealthy widow: Love or something darker?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Some right-wing US politicians want Ukraine to vote as scheduled next year. Ukrainians don't.
articles.title: Ukraine war: Fierce row erupts over 2024 election

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Crowds gathered in major cities after a the killing of a student sent shockwaves across the country.
articles.title: Italy rallies to condemn violence against women draw huge crowds

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The ex-police officer who murdered George Floyd is thought to have survived the attack.
articles.title: Derek Chauvin stabbed in prison - US media reports

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Omid Scobie criticises media reports that use translations of extracts from his new book Endgame.
articles.title: Endgame author Omid Scobie criticises translated extracts of royal book

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.description: Jannik Sinner beats Novak Djokovic to help Italy overcome Serbia to join Australia in the Davis Cup final.
articles.title: Sinner stuns Djokovic as Italy reach Davis Cup final

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The French government has launched a campaign encouraging people not to buy new clothes during festive sales.
articles.title: France warns people off Black Friday clothes deals
